local_intent: Lower the grasped bread onto the plate until contact is detected, ensuring position above plate first, then verify contact.
assumptions: Plate is within view and reachable
coherence_with_global: Implements the placement micro-goal by confirming plate visibility, ensuring the robot is above the plate (or moves above), performing LowerUntilContact with the specified parameters, and verifying contact, matching the corresponding segment of the global plan.
